on.$description: switch.color.thumb.on — Switch thumb color when on.

off.$description: switch.color.track.off — Off state track background color.

on.$description: switch.color.track.on — On state track background color.

ringOffset.$description: switch.focus.ringOffset — Focus ring offset (2px). Space between switch track and focus ring for clear visual separation.

ringWidth.$description: switch.focus.ringWidth — Focus ring width (2px). Clearly visible ring around switch when focused via keyboard navigation.

fontSize.$description: switch.label.fontSize — Label font size (14px). Standard form label size. Readable without overwhelming the switch control itself.

gap.$description: switch.label.gap — Gap between switch and label (12px). Clear separation between control and label while maintaining visual association.

borderRadius.$description: switch.thumb.borderRadius — Thumb border radius (fully rounded/circular). Creates perfect circle for the sliding handle. Essential for the switch visual language.

offset.$description: switch.thumb.offset — Thumb offset from track edge (2px). Small gap between thumb and track edge creates visual breathing room and indicates interactive affordance.

lg.$description: switch.thumb.size.lg — Large thumb size (22px). Larger handle for better visibility and touch interaction.

md.$description: switch.thumb.size.md — Medium thumb size (18px). DEFAULT. Standard thumb for md track. Clear visual indicator of toggle position.

sm.$description: switch.thumb.size.sm — Small thumb size (14px). Proportional to sm track. Maintains visual balance within track.

xl.$description: switch.thumb.size.xl — Extra large thumb size (28px). Maximum handle size for high-visibility, touch-optimized toggles.

xs.$description: switch.thumb.size.xs — Extra small thumb size (12px). Circular handle for xs track. Sized to fit comfortably within track with offset padding.

borderRadius.$description: switch.track.borderRadius — Track border radius (fully rounded/pill shape). Creates the characteristic pill shape of toggle switches. Value 9999px ensures full rounding at any height.

lg.$description: switch.track.height.lg — Large track height (30px). Taller track for better visibility and touch targets.

md.$description: switch.track.height.md — Medium track height (24px). DEFAULT. Comfortable height for most use cases. Good thumb-to-track proportion.

sm.$description: switch.track.height.sm — Small track height (20px). Standard density track height for desktop applications.

xl.$description: switch.track.height.xl — Extra large track height (36px). Maximum height for high-visibility toggles and accessibility.

xs.$description: switch.track.height.xs — Extra small track height (16px). Slim track for compact layouts. Thumb will be proportionally smaller.

lg.$description: switch.track.width.lg — Large track width (52px). Use for: touch-optimized interfaces, prominent feature toggles, accessibility-focused UIs. Better for mobile.

md.$description: switch.track.width.md — Medium track width (44px). DEFAULT size. Use for: most settings toggles, preferences panels, feature controls. Comfortable interaction size.

sm.$description: switch.track.width.sm — Small track width (36px). Use for: standard density settings, secondary controls. Good for desktop interfaces.

xl.$description: switch.track.width.xl — Extra large track width (60px). Use for: high-emphasis standalone toggles, large touch targets, maximum accessibility. Most prominent option.

xs.$description: switch.track.width.xs — Extra small track width (28px). Use for: compact settings lists, inline toggles, space-constrained UIs. Maintains approximately 1.75:1 width-to-height ratio.

duration.$description: switch.transition.duration — Switch transition duration (100ms). Fast, snappy animation for immediate feedback feel. Sliding motion should feel responsive.

easing.$description: switch.transition.easing — Switch transition easing (ease-out). Thumb decelerates into final position for natural, satisfying toggle motion.
